entries: Your art is your greatest passion, whatever form it takes.
Adventuring might help you find inspiration, or simply be a way to survive until you become a world-famous artist.
Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Dexterity or Charisma, and one is a free ability boost.
You're trained in the {@skill Crafting} skill and the {@skill Lore||Art Lore} skill. You gain the {@feat Specialty Crafting} skill feat.
